awardEventDetails.title: 2012 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.for: TV Program of the Year
awardEventDetails.description: (BOARDWALK EMPIRE struts into its second year with an intoxicating air, adding new layers of complexity to this sumptuous, sprawling saga of Atlantic City during Prohibition. Martin Scorsese and Terence Winter command a talented ensemble that tells a tale of America, this year uncorking the emotional inner life of Steve Buscemi's "Nucky Thompson" and the world he rules with an iron fist.)

awardEventDetails.title: 2011 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.for: TV Program of the Year
awardEventDetails.description: (BOARDWALK EMPIRE struts into its second year with an intoxicating air, adding new layers of complexity to this sumptuous, sprawling saga of Atlantic City during Prohibition. Martin Scorsese and Terence Winter command a talented ensemble that tells a tale of America, this year uncorking the emotional inner life of Steve Buscemi's "Nucky Thompson" and the world he rules with an iron fist.)

awardsHtml:
64 wins & 184 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

Timothy Van Patten (For Eldorado (2014))

Outstanding Sound Editing for a Series

Costanzo (foley artist) (For episode: "The Good Listener".)
2015 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Prosthetic Makeup for a Series, Limited Series, Movie or a Special
Michele Paris (department head makeup artist) - Joseph Farulla (key makeup artist) (For episode "The Good Listener")
2015 Winner Primetime Emmy

Outstanding Cinematography for a Single-Camera Series

AFI Awards, USA

2012 Winner AFI Award
TV Program of the Year
(BOARDWALK EMPIRE struts into its second year with an intoxicating air, adding new layers of complexity to this sumptuous, sprawling saga of Atlantic City during Prohibition. Martin Scorsese and Terence Winter command a talented ensemble that tells a tale of America, this year uncorking the emotional inner life of Steve Buscemi's "Nucky Thompson" and the world he rules with an iron fist.)
